dc.title: RITA | Bureau of Transportation Statistics (BTS)
dc.description: The Bureau of Transportation Statistics (BTS) is dedicated solely to the advancement of the U.S. Department of Transportation (USDOT, US DOT or DOT) priorities for transportation data and statistics. BTS is responsible for transportation data collection, coordination and comparability and statistical analysis.
